mapper.select: select floor(to_number(sysdate-to_date(to_char(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))) as seniority, floor(TO_NUMBER(add_months(birthday , ceil(months_between(sysdate,birthday) / 12) * 12) -sysdate)) as nextbirthday, USER_ID, USERNAME, EMAIL, DEPARTMENT, CREATE_TIME, BIRTHDAY from USER_LOGIN_C where 1=1 and EMAIL=#{email} and PASSWORD=#{passWord}

select floor(to_number(sysdate-to_date(to_char(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))) as seniority, floor(TO_NUMBER(add_months(birthday , ceil(months_between(sysdate,birthday) / 12) * 12) -sysdate)) as nextbirthday, USER_ID, USERNAME,EMAIL,DEPARTMENT, CREATE_TIME, BIRTHDAY from USER_LOGIN_C where email=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into USER_LOGIN_C (USER_ID,USERNAME,PASSWORD,EMAIL,DEPARTMENT, CREATE_TIME, BIRTHDAY) values ( #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
